Park City Accommodations

From Luxury Resorts to Cozy Condos - Find Your Perfect Mountain Retreat

Luxury Resorts

Park City offers accommodations ranging from world-class luxury resorts to budget-friendly hotels and everything in between.

St. Regis Deer Valley

Ultra-luxury ski-in/ski-out resort with world-class amenities. Features include butler service, Remède Spa, and multiple fine dining venues.

  • 5-Star AAA Five Diamond rating
  • Ski-in/ski-out at Deer Valley Resort
  • Butler service and Remède Spa
  • Multiple fine dining restaurants
  • Price range: $$$$

Montage Deer Valley

Alpine-inspired luxury with ski-in/ski-out access. Features Spa Montage, multiple pools, and activities for all ages.

  • Forbes Five Star rated
  • Ski-in/ski-out access
  • Spa Montage and kids' club
  • Bowling alley and game room
  • Price range: $$$$

Waldorf Astoria Park City

Sophisticated luxury at the base of Park City Mountain. Features gondola access, spa, and refined mountain elegance.

  • AAA Four Diamond rating
  • Gondola access to slopes
  • Golden Door Spa
  • Heated outdoor pool
  • Price range: $$$$

Stein Eriksen Lodge

Norwegian-inspired luxury with mid-mountain location at Deer Valley. Known for exceptional service and elegant atmosphere.

  • Forbes Four Star rating
  • Ski-in/ski-out location
  • Award-winning spa services
  • Gourmet dining options
  • Price range: $$$$

The Lodge at Blue Sky

Auberge resort on 3,500 acres offering luxury ranch experiences. Perfect for those seeking adventure beyond skiing.

  • Luxury ranch experience
  • 20 minutes from ski slopes
  • Horseback riding and fly fishing
  • 3,500 acres of wilderness
  • Price range: $$$$

Hotel Park City

All-suite luxury hotel with residential feel. Features full kitchens, fireplaces, and personalized service.

  • All-suite accommodations
  • Full kitchens and fireplaces
  • Free shuttle to slopes
  • Concierge services
  • Price range: $$$-$$$$

Mid-Range Hotels

Hyatt Centric Park City

Modern hotel in the heart of Park City with mountain views. Walking distance to Main Street and free shuttle to slopes.

  • Downtown Park City location
  • Walking distance to Main Street
  • Heated outdoor pool
  • Fitness center and spa services
  • Price range: $$$

DoubleTree by Hilton

Comfortable rooms at the Park City Mountain base. Convenient location with easy slope access.

  • Park City Mountain base location
  • Easy slope access
  • Ski storage facilities
  • Hot tub and fitness center
  • Price range: $$-$$$

Marriott Summit Watch

Spacious villas with kitchens near Main Street. Great for families and longer stays.

  • Walking distance to Main Street
  • Full kitchen facilities
  • Multiple swimming pools
  • Family-friendly amenities
  • Price range: $$$

Newpark Resort

All-suite hotel near Kimball Junction. Modern amenities and easy access to both ski resorts.

  • Kimball Junction location
  • Suite accommodations with kitchens
  • Pool and hot tub
  • Close to shopping and dining
  • Price range: $$-$$$

Peaks Hotel

Boutique hotel with modern mountain style. Rooftop hot tub with panoramic views.

  • Near Main Street location
  • Boutique mountain style
  • Rooftop deck with hot tub
  • Modern amenities
  • Price range: $$$

AC Hotel Park City

European-inspired modern hotel. Stylish design with mountain views and contemporary amenities.

  • Kimball Junction location
  • European-inspired design
  • Modern fitness center
  • Mountain views
  • Price range: $$-$$$

Budget-Friendly Options

Best Western Landmark Inn

Reliable budget option with complimentary breakfast. Free shuttle service to ski resorts and Main Street.

  • Complimentary continental breakfast
  • Free shuttle to resorts
  • Indoor pool and hot tub
  • Pet-friendly accommodations
  • Price range: $-$$

Holiday Inn Express

Clean, comfortable rooms at Kimball Junction. Good value with breakfast included.

  • Kimball Junction location
  • Hot breakfast included
  • Indoor pool and spa
  • Business center
  • Price range: $$

Hampton Inn

Consistent quality at a fair price. Hot breakfast and convenient location near shopping.

  • Free hot breakfast daily
  • Free WiFi throughout
  • Fitness center access
  • Near shopping centers
  • Price range: $$

Comfort Inn

Basic but clean accommodations with good amenities. Solid choice for budget-conscious families.

  • Indoor pool and hot tub
  • Continental breakfast
  • Family-friendly rooms
  • Ski shuttle service
  • Price range: $$

Park City Hostel

Budget travelers' favorite with dorm and private rooms. Great way to meet fellow adventurers.

  • Dorm and private rooms
  • Shared kitchen facilities
  • Social common areas
  • Budget-friendly rates
  • Price range: $

Chateau Apres Lodge

Cozy lodge near Park City Mountain. European-style with character and charm.

  • Near Park City Mountain
  • European-style character
  • Hot tub and sauna
  • Unique mountain charm
  • Price range: $$

Vacation Rentals & Condos

Popular Rental Areas

  • Old Town: Walk to Main Street, historic charm
  • Park Meadows: Affordable, family-friendly
  • Deer Valley: Luxury ski-in/ski-out properties
  • The Canyons: Modern condos with amenities
  • Prospector: Budget-friendly, close to town
  • Empire Pass: Ultra-luxury mountain homes

Rental Platforms & Managers

  • Park City Lodging: Local property management
  • All Seasons Resort Lodging: Wide selection
  • Wyndham Vacation Rentals: Professional service
  • David Holland's Resort Lodging: Premium properties
  • VRBO/Airbnb: Direct owner rentals
  • RedAwning: Luxury vacation homes

What to Expect

  • Full kitchens and dining areas
  • Multiple bedrooms and bathrooms
  • Living areas with fireplaces
  • Private hot tubs (many properties)
  • Ski storage and boot dryers
  • Parking spaces included

Location Guide: Where to Stay

Historic Main Street Area

Best for: Nightlife, dining, walkability

  • Walk to restaurants and bars
  • Free transit to ski resorts
  • Historic charm and character
  • Limited parking availability
  • Can be busy on weekends

Deer Valley Area

Best for: Luxury, skiing, families

  • Ski-in/ski-out options available
  • Upscale accommodations and dining
  • Family-friendly atmosphere
  • Higher price points
  • Need transportation for nightlife

Park City Mountain Base

Best for: Convenience, skiing, value

  • Walk to ski lifts
  • More affordable than Deer Valley
  • Good dining and shopping options
  • Less intimate than Old Town
  • Busy during peak ski season

Kimball Junction

Best for: Budget, shopping, families

  • Lower accommodation prices
  • Shopping and chain restaurants
  • Easy highway access
  • Need transportation to slopes
  • Less mountain town atmosphere

Booking Tips & Advice

When to Book

  • Peak season (Dec-Mar): Book 3-6 months ahead
  • Major holidays: Book 6+ months in advance
  • Summer season: Book 2-3 months ahead
  • Best deals: April-May and October-November
  • Last-minute: Check for cancellations

Money-Saving Tips

  • Book packages with lift tickets
  • Stay mid-week for lower rates
  • Consider shoulder seasons
  • Look for properties with kitchens
  • Check for resort fees before booking
  • Compare total costs including taxes

What to Consider

  • Distance to activities you want
  • Transportation options available
  • Parking fees and availability
  • Resort fees and extra charges
  • Cancellation policies
  • Group size and room configurations

Important Amenities to Consider

For Skiers

  • Ski storage and lockers
  • Boot dryers and warming areas
  • Hot tubs for après-ski
  • Shuttle service to slopes
  • Ski valet services
  • Equipment rental nearby

For Families

  • Full kitchen facilities
  • Separate bedroom spaces
  • Swimming pool and game rooms
  • Kids' programs and activities
  • Cribs and high chairs available
  • Laundry facilities

For Comfort

  • Fireplace in living areas
  • Balcony or deck with views
  • Parking spaces included
  • Fitness center access
  • Concierge services
  • High-speed internet
Check Event Calendar
